text: @RishiSunak But one of our country’s greatest strengths is its small business sector that already exists? Well it did before you excluded small Ltd company directors anything but the bare minimum of help during #COVID19 you destroy it, and then offer this?! #ForgottenLtd #2MillionReasonsWhy
